sets.detail:
200 Speed with Specialty Boots is to be as fast as possible, speed tying Boots Deludrix and other max Speed Boots Ikazune 
 192 Ranged Attack with Smart is to hit as hard as possible 
 104 Energy = 300 Energy at level 50 for (6 of any move)
sets.author: Epicly Epic Gamer

sets.tps: 96 HP, 200 R Atk, 200 Sp / 104 En, 192 R Atk
sets.detail:
200 / 192 Ranged attack is to hit as hard as possible 
 200 Speed with Nimble is to be as fast as possible and speedties Nimble Wintrix 
 104 Energy = 300 Energy at level 50 for (5 of any move + 2 Magnify) without Power Cuffs 
 0 Energy = 280 Energy at level 50 for (4 Fire Breaths + 1 Magnify) with Power Cuffs 
 96 HP is leftovers and increases overall bulk
sets.author: Epicly Epic Gamer
